Class Fly

java.lang.Object
GameObject
Biologic
Animal
Insect
Fly
public class Fly extends Insect
This class inherits from Insect class and simulates a fly.

Fly class redefine :

  • eat() method.
  • grow() method.
  • toString().

Fly inherits directly from Insect class which inherits from Animal class.
